Description: Name of district according to ``GGDENAME`` in :ref:`master_file` and ``Municipality`` in :ref:`meta_file`.
Heating degree days for the district based on a reference temperature (start temperature for heating) of 12°C.
Source for |Swiss_data_Zenodo_link|: Computed based on temperature data of 2023 using the methods of Schneeberger et al. (2025)

Description: Heating degree days for the district based on a reference temperature (start temperature for heating) of 15°C.
Source for |Swiss_data_Zenodo_link|: Computed based on temperature data of 2023 using the methods of Schneeberger et al. (2025)
